title: Hornbeam Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, British, English
description: Non-profit operation that's part of wider eco initiative. Supports local disadvantaged group. Vegan-friendly food that's local, organic, vegetarian and reflects the different cuisines of the borough. A relaxing place on a busy street corner. Formerly named Gannets.
streetAddress: Hornbeam Environmental Centre, 458 Hoe Street, Walthamstow
